mapper.update: update l_storagetype set storagetypeid=storagetypeid ,storagetypename=#{storagetypename} ,orderno=#{orderno} where storagetypeid=#{storagetypeid}

update l_storagetype set storagetypeid=storagetypeid ,storagetypename=#{storagetypename} ,orderno=#{orderno} where 1=1 and storagetypeid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and storagetypeid =#{Where_Id} and storagetypeid=#{Where_storagetypeid} and storagetypename=#{Where_storagetypename} and orderno=#{Where_orderno}
mapper.select: select t.storagetypeid "storagetypeid", t.storagetypename "storagetypename", t.orderno "orderno" from l_storagetype t where storagetypeid=#{storagetypeid}

select t.storagetypeid "storagetypeid", t.storagetypename "storagetypename", t.orderno "orderno" from l_storagetype t where 1=1 and t.storagetypeid=#{storagetypeid} and t.storagetypename=#{storagetypename} and t.orderno=#{orderno}

select t.storagetypeid "storagetypeid", t.storagetypename "storagetypename", t.orderno "orderno" from l_storagetype t where 1=1 and t.storagetypeid=#{storagetypeid} and t.storagetypename=#{storagetypename} and t.orderno=#{orderno}
mapper.delete: delete from l_storagetype where 1=1 and storagetypeid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and storagetypeid =#{Where_Id} and storagetypeid=#{Where_storagetypeid} and storagetypename=#{Where_storagetypename} and orderno=#{Where_orderno}
mapper.select: select t.storagetypeid "storagetypeid", t.storagetypename "storagetypename", t.orderno "orderno" from l_storagetype t where 1=1 and t.storagetypeid=#{storagetypeid} and t.storagetypename=#{storagetypename} and t.orderno=#{orderno}
select count(*) from l_storagetype t where 1=1 and t.storagetypeid=#{storagetypeid} and t.storagetypeid!=#{noid} and t.storagetypename=#{storagetypename} and t.orderno=#{orderno}
